originalText.text: I booked the Hip Hop Pink Gorilla for a 21st birthday in a corporate office. This was so much fun! Bernard can really bust a move and hype up the crowd in an appropriate way for the middle of the work day. Lol He showed up within the agreed window so make sure you time it out properly. Have your cameras ready because he walks in the door in character. John at Big Apple is very responsive, pleasant, patient and professional. I will be using his service again.

originalText.text: Elvis has left the building! We hired Elvis (aka Chris) to surprise our daughter on her birthday since we couldn’t be with her to celebrate. It was, by far, the best birthday present we could have given her. She will forget the presents, cakes, and packages, but this life experience will last forever. Elvis was professional, engaging, funny, appropriate, and very talented. All of our family members and friends keep watching the video. My daughter was so shocked. She laughed so hard she cried. When the shock wore off, she danced, clapped and enjoyed the personalized lyrics and show. Total happiness!!!

originalText.text:
I’d first like to say “A Huge Thank You” and give a “Huge Round Of Applause” to Big Apple Singing Telegrams.

Big Apple Singing Telegrams did a fantastic job and helped make sure that my wife and I had a wonderful Valentines Day Celebration!!!

Our sensational singing telegram artist was Bernard and he delivered a stunning and breathtaking musical performance for my wife.

Bernard’s performance was amazing it certainly brought my wife to tears. Bernard was unquestionably great, impeccably polite and courteous, and definitely a “First Class” professional. I highly recommend for all customers, and no matter the event (Christmas, Birthday’s, Anniversaries and of course Valentine’s Day Events) select and choose Bernard to perform at their special event.

I also definitely have to thank John, the organization’s leader for his great customer service and for offering me a great affordable package.

All in All, if you are looking to utilize a great singing telegram service, then look no further Big Apple Singing Telegrams.

originalText.text:
Hello!

Thank you so much Big Apple Singing Telegrams for three AWESOME performance we booked to a going away BBQ in my backyard in Astoria. The guests were a married couple moving away from NYC.

We all pitched in and booked three performances in a row for a going away party and each one was incredibly unique. Jon (the founder) worked with me on how to escalate the fun with three performers, once every hour. We wanted to start from sweet and get to inappropriate and weird. I appreciate his flexibility and availability. This guy understands how to party!

Lynn the Pink Gorilla was super sweet. She sang some Tina Turner songs and got our two guests of honor up to dance and sing. "Awwwws" and happy tears filled the air. Rated G for everyone

An hour later Chris the man-baby came by and boy was he entertaining! Such confidence in his performance! I requested him to sing an Aerosmith song and he incorporated their names in the lyrics which was a nice touch. This was a brilliant 2nd act. Rated PG-13.

And finally, oh boy... The Male Marilyn Monroe who was played by Luis. I'm not sure what word I can use. Insanely hilarious? You can tell this guy put a lot of thought into this. One of the most interesting acts I have ever seen. I have been to a few drag shows and I have never been so entertained. This was INSANE! The best part was him constantly and "accidentally" breaking the 4th wall pretending to be nervous. A genius, unique act. A tip for this one is don't introduce the act. Just let it happen. Rated M for Mature.

Luis mentioned to me afterward that we were a very good and engaging audience and that's really important for these performers so if you decide to book a performer make sure a few of your friends are on in on it and PARTICIPATE! Don't be shy and give them permission to touch or sit on their guests because that's when the crying laughter comes out.

I highly recommend! Consider the rules of 3 package!

Thanks again Big Apple!

originalText.text: Jon was a tremendous help - last minute- and my daughter was totally surprised and appropriately embarrassed in a great way!  Michael Jackson did a great job!
